equation:
\begin{equation} \label{superpotential-W}
W= W(\Phi)+ \sqrt{2} \widetilde{{\cal Q}}^a_i \Phi^b_a {\cal Q}_b^i+
\sqrt{2} \widetilde{{\cal Q}}^a_i m^i_j {\cal Q}^j_a,
\

\begin{equation}  \label{r-th-M}
M_i^j= \widetilde{Q}_i^a Q_a^j=\left[ \begin{array}{ccc}
(PK)_{r\times r}  & ~~(\widetilde{K}^t K)_{r\times r}~~ & 0_{r\times (M_u-2r)} \\
0_{r\times r}~~  & 0_{r\times r}~~ & 0_{r\times (M_u-2r)} \\
0_{{(M_u-2r)} \times r}  & 0_{(M_{u}-2r) \times r}~~ & 0_{{(M_u-2r)\times (M_u-2r)}} \\
\end{array} \right].
\

\begin{equation} \label{effect-r-th}
\begin{array}{cccccccccccc}
 &  SU(r) & \times  &  U(1)_0 & \times  &  U(1)_1 & \times & \cdots & \times
& U(1)_{N_i-r-1} & \times & U(1)_B \\
 M_i\times q &  {\bf r} &   &  1 &   &  0 &  & \cdots & 
& 0 & & 0  \\
 e_1 &  {\bf 1} &   & 0 &   &  1 &  & \cdots & 
& 0 & & 0  \\
 \vdots &  \vdots &   & \vdots &   &  \vdots &  & \ddots & 
& \vdots & & \vdots \\
 e_{N_i-r-1} &  {\bf 1} &   & 0 &   &  0 &  & \cdots & 
& 1 & & 0  \\
\end{array}
\

\begin{equation} \label{effect-bary-th}
\begin{array}{cccccccccccc}
 &  SU(r) & \times  &  U(1)_1 & \times  &  U(1)_2 & \times & \cdots & \times
& U(1)_{N_i-r} & \times & U(1)_B \\
 M_i\times q &  {\bf r} &   & 1/r &   &  1/r &  & \cdots & 
& 1/r & & -N_i/r  \\
 e_1 &  {\bf 1} &   & -1 &   &  0 &  & \cdots & 
& 0 & & 0  \\
 \vdots &  \vdots &   & \vdots &   &  \vdots &  & \ddots & 
& \vdots & & \vdots \\
e_{N_i-r} &  {\bf 1} &   & 0 &   &  0 &  & \cdots & 
& -1 & & 0  \\
\end{array}
\

\begin{equation} \label{Chebyshev}
{\cal T}_t(x)=\cos(tx),~~~{\cal U}_{t-1}(x)={1\over t}{\partial {\cal T}_t(x)
\over dx},~~~{\cal T}_t(x)^2-1=(x^2-1) {\cal U}_{t-1}(x)^2.
\
